featured.text: When it was arranged for her to sing at Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C., the Daughters of the American Revolution opposed it because of her color.

definition.zh_def: 憲法；一個國家的基本法律和原則。
definition.en_def: A constitution is a set of fundamental principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed.
definition.example: The constitution of the country guarantees freedom of speech.
